more.requirement: Be a senior or junior student majoring in IT (SQL, C#,) Be responsible, careful, detail oriented and hard working Intern needs to work in 3-4 months
more.description: Assist IT department to monitoring and executing IT project (network and system infa structure). Support User at HQ using (PC, laptop, office..). Assist IT department to setup and maintenance IT devices.
more.benefit: Lunch and parking fees (No salary). Business-travel fee bonus. On-the-job training. Opportunity to work in a friendly and stimulating working environment.
more.keyword: Giao tiếp hiệu quả,Kỹ năng chăm sóc khách hàng,Kỹ năng giải quyết tình huống,Tập trung trong công việc,Chịu được áp lực công việc,Trung thực,Nhiệt tình,Tinh thần làm việc nhóm
